blogs.title: Personal site progress
blogs.content: I'm enjoying experimenting with Bootstrap here, but I am really ready to move to single-page applications, if, as it's been implied, that means we can refactor our structural HTML (separate out headers and footers).

blogs.title: Company site redo
blogs.content: I'm looking forward to redoing this projects, especially if we can do it as a SPA. Not that I'm 100% sure what that means at this point.

blogs.title: Git shaming
blogs.content: I was thoroughly and rightly shamed yesterday for reviewing and merging my own pull requests.

blogs.title: Group project redo
blogs.content: I would like to brag that, through a combination of communication and divine pity, our group had no merge conflicts to speak of the entire project.

blogs.title: Bronchitis
blogs.content: I missed half of Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday because I was busy hacking up both my lungs. I probably should have stayed home today but I... like?? school?? too much??

blogs.title: I am helpful, finally
blogs.content: Val has identified me as a go-to resource, at least for favicons. I'm not sure where she got that but I was able to help her.

blogs.title: jQuery at last
blogs.content: We've finally broached jQuery and I am a very happy camper. Finally I can use it without feeling like a douchebag show-off.
